snippet.title: Submachine: Legacy - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Submachine: Legacy on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1564790
Developer: Mateusz Skutnik
Music and sound Design: ThumpMonks
Featuring music by Marcus Gutierrez
Publisher: Mateusz Skutnik
Release Date: October 13th, 2023
~
Submachine is a puzzle adventure game. You will explore a vast network of interconnected rooms and solve puzzles with items you find along the way.
This is a complete remaster of the entire Submachine series, divided into 13 chapters.
There are also new puzzles, new locations and new mysteries to uncover and solve.
